content.rendered:
About Us

About FundQuest

FundQuest Financial Services Limited is a financial institution incorporated in Nigeria in January 2012. The Company is licensed and regulated by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) as a Finance Company to operate within the middle tier of the Nigerian financial system, playing complementary roles to banks in bridging financing and investing gaps. 

FundQuest focuses principally on providing financial intermediation services to Individuals, Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) and Corporate Institutions through creating Consumer Loans and Advances, LPO Financing, Project Financing, Export Financing, Equipment Leasing, Fixed Term Investments, Funds Management, Financial Consultancy and Business Advisory Services.

Our Vision

To be the destination in the Quest for innovative funding and financing solutions in Africa

Our Mission

The revered value place; the preferred workplace

Our Approach

At FundQuest, we leverage our deep understanding of the Nigerian financial markets, macro-economic trends and customer expectations to proffer workable solutions to clients’ funding requirements, provide structured investible products, and deliver best-in-class financial intermediation services. 

We also recreate generic financial products to provide bundles of innovative and bespoke offerings that optimize our clients’ investment returns; while enhancing their access to timely and efficient funding opportunities. At the core of every of our business engagements lies the unrelenting Quest to be a revered value place to all our esteemed clients and stakeholders.

Our Core Values

Our business operations are carried out within the ambit of the guiding principles encapsulated in the acronym F.I.L.E.S.

Flexibility

• A business orientation that accepts each customer as unique

• No generic application of business rules to customers’ needs

Innovation

• Relentless pursuit of improved solutions to issues

• Building capability and continuously reimagining

Leadership

• Taking charge and owning your business

• Thinking bold. Seeing the possible. Taking responsible risk

Excellence

• Entrenching a culture of high standards and exceptional execution

• Doing the right thing and doing it right

Simplicity

• Nimbleness in business processes for speedy service delivery

• Operational agility for easy adaptation and scaling

Our Commitment

The Company aspires to become a renowned and unbounded marketplace in the delivery of accretive financial solutions.

To our Customers

We will consistently be adaptive to your expectations while serving your needs timely and at the most competitive price.

To our Shareholders

We will constantly seek to invest in opportunities that maximize your Return on Equity (ROE) without compromising our brand equity and business sustainability.

To our Employees

We will always seek to provide a rewarding and safe workplace for you while building internal leadership competencies and an institution that outlive its founders.

To our Regulators

We will continuously strive to be a responsible financial institution in all our business practices and conducts.

To our Service Providers

We will seek to be a reliable partner in keeping to our contracts while promoting business relationship that is mutually profitable.

To our Community

We will consistently run as a business that generates positive environmental footprints and promote inclusive neighbourliness.

Board Of Directors

Management Team

Corporate Governance

Careers
